dct_title_s: Map to illustrate Major Rawlinson's route from Zohab to Khúzistan, in 1836
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. Major Rawlinson's route is colored red. Roads and dry rivers are shown. From: Journal of the Royal Geographical Society of London. Vol. 9 (1839), pp. 26-116; held in Firestone Library. Call number: G7 .J687 v.9 1839.
dct_publisher_sm: London : published for the Journal of the Royal Geographical Society, by J. Murray, Albemarle Street, 1839.
dct_subject_sm: Chahār Maḥāll va Bakhtiyārī (Iran : Province)—Description and travel
dcat_theme_sm: Chahār Maḥāll va Bakhtiyārī (Iran : Province)—Description and travel
